price: (14) And whoever is on earth entirely [so] then it could save him.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
